work.name: Mohamed Bin Zayed University of Artificial Intelligence
work.summary: Conducting research on extreme multi-label classification and efficient machine learning. Focused on accelerating LLM inference and enabling sparse computation for large-scale models.

work.name: Yahoo Inc.
work.summary: Built data-driven discount and product selection systems. Increased revenue and profit margins through automation and A/B validation.

work.name: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC)
work.summary: Applied deep learning and computer vision to wafer manufacturing. Improved yield and efficiency through bias simulation and real-time defect classification.
